title: Theory of a Deadman - Scars and Souvenirs (2008)
description:
Scars & Souvenirs is the third album by Canadian band Theory of a Deadman, and was released on April 1st, 2008. It debuted at Number 10 on Billboard Top Rock Albums, Number 8 on Billboard Top Modern Rock/Alternative Albums, Number 1 on Billboard Top Hard Rock albums, and Number 26 on the Billboard 200. The album has so far been more successful than the band's previous albums. It features first-class chest-thumping vocals from Tyler Connolly and a sturdy helping of hard-rocking meat and potatoes from guitarist David Brenner. A guaranteed rock-radio crowd pleaser.
[Source: Wikipedia & cduniverse.com]

Original Release Year: 2008
Genre: Rock
